class.description: Provides functionality for authenticating calls to Azure Storage Services.

property.name: AccessKey
property.descrip: A valid base64 access key for the Azure storage account.

property.name: Account
property.descrip: The Azure storage account name. (A storage account can contain zero or more containers. A container contains properties, metadata, and zero or more blobs. A blob is any single entity comprised of binary data, properties, and metadata. )

property.name: Scheme
property.descrip: Can be "SharedKey" or "SharedKeyLite". The default value is "SharedKey".

property.name: Service
property.descrip: Can be "Blob", "Queue", "File", or "Table". The default is "Blob".

property.name: XMsVersion
property.descrip: If set, automatically adds the "x-ms-version" HTTP request header to Azure Storage requests. The default value is "2014-02-14".
